items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to discuss tasks and projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and accessible for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Messages must be delivered within 1 second.
Chat service uptime must be at least 99.9%.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Further clarification needed on additional features like file sharing, notifications, and permissions.
